lead_paragraph: Former England captain Stuart Pearce is set to come out of retirement at the age of 53 to help out a minor league side who have conceded 183 goals in 19 games this season.

headline.print_headline: Stuart Pearce Set for Non-League Comeback at 53
headline.main: Stuart Pearce Set for Non-League Comeback at 53

snippet: Former England captain Stuart Pearce is set to come out of retirement at the age of 53 to help out a minor league side who have conceded 183 goals in 19 games this season....
